name: Barcode Scanner
description: Super port scanner with batter included: accurate, fast, reliable, height performance by ProxyDr.com.

apis.name: Barcode Scanner
apis.description: This is a barcode scanner. This is fast and easy to use, only one method. This API support JPEG, GIF and PNG images and can read a lot of barcodes ( UPC-A, UPC-E, EAN-13, EAN-8, RSS14, RSS-Expanded, Code39, Code93, Code128, ITF, QRCode, Data-Matrix, Aztec, PDF417, and Codabar ). Now you can Scan barcodes from your SmartPhone or your iPad or your PC. For Issues or problems please use this link https://github.com/ogonbat/MashapeDaddyRestClient/issues
